2022-23.comment: Part of a three-team trade with the Minnesota Wild.
Part of a three-team trade with Washington Capitals. Minnesota retain 25% of Orlov cap hit.
Part of a three-team trade with Boston Bruins. Washington retains 50% of Orlov cap hit.

If the Rangers advance past the first round of the Stanley Cup playoffs, the Senators will receive a sixth round pick, whichever is lowest between New York and the Winnipeg Jets, instead of a seventh.

Three-team trade with Minnesota. 
St. Louis will retain 50% and Minnesota will retain 25% of O’Reilly’s salary as part of the trade
Three-team trade with St. Louis involving Ryan O'Reilly. Minnesota retains 25% of O’Reilly’s salary as part of the trade.

The 2023 first-round pick will be the lower of Dallas' and New York's (so the Rangers still have a first-rounder in 2023) and the 2024 fourth rounder will become a third if the Rangers make the playoffs.
Blues retain 50% of Tarasenko's salary.
Seattle currently has two 2023 fourth round picks (theirs and Colorado's) and the Kraken have until June 15th to decide which one they will send to San Jose.

The first round pick is top-12 protected, meaning that if the pick finishes in the top-12 of this year's draft, the Islanders keep the 2023 selection and the Canucks receive the Islanders' 2024 first round pick.
If the Stars' own first round pick in 2023 is in the top 10, New York will get Dallas' own first round selection in 2024 instead, and that pick will be unprotected.

Montreal shall receive the better of Calgary's 2026 first round choice or Florida's 2026 first round choice (following the determination of the 2026 NHL Draft lottery results) (previously conditionally acquired by Calgary)

The Flames get Florida's 2025 first round pick if (a) Florida's 2024 first rounder is not top 10 (and goes to Philadelphia in the Claude Giroux trade) AND (b) Florida's 2025 first round pick is not top 10 (and Florida keeps it). If the Flames get the first rounder, Calgary's 2025 fourth-round pick goes to Florida.
With the conditional pick, Arizona has the option to acquire New York's own 2024 3rd round pick or its own 2026 2nd round pick
The Sharks also will retain 34 percent of Burns' remaining salary for the remaining three years on his contract.

2021-22.comment: Pick can become a first if Minnesota advances to the Western Conference Final and Fleury wins four or more games within the first two rounds of the Stanley Cup Playoffs.

Three team trade. Carolina Hurricanes acquire Max Domi and  Tyler Inamoto from the Columbus Blue Jackets in exchange for Aidan Hreschuk. Florida Panthers receive Egor Korshkov and a 6th round pick in the 2022 NHL Draft.
If the Oilers make the Stanley Cup final, the 2022 pick becomes a 2023 pick.
If Senyshyn plays five NHL games with the Senators before the end of the season, the 7th round pick will become a 6th round pick.

Conditional second round pick 1: Rangers' 2nd round pick in 2022 becomes a 1st round pick in 2022 if the Rangers advance to the Eastern Conference Final and Copp plays in at least 50 percent of New York's playoff games.

Conditional second round pick 2: Either St. Louis' 2nd round pick in 2022 or the Rangers' 2nd round pick in 2023.

Three team trade. Carolina Hurricanes acquire Max Domi and  Tyler Inamoto from the Columbus Blue Jackets in exchange for Aidan Hreschuk. Florida Panthers receive Egor Korshkov and a 6th round pick in the 2022 NHL Draft.

Three team trade. Carolina Hurricanes acquire Max Domi and  Tyler Inamoto from the Columbus Blue Jackets in exchange for Aidan Hreschuk. Florida Panthers receive Egor Korshkov and a 6th round pick in the 2022 NHL Draft.
The pick becomes a 3rd round pick if the Stars make the playoffs in the current season.

Should the 2023 first-round pick be in the top 10, the Lightning will instead transfer their own, unprotected first-round pick in the 2025 NHL Draft to the Blackhawks. In the event both of the Lightning's 2023 and 2024 picks are in the top 10, then Tampa Bay will transfer its unprotected first-round picks in the 2025 draft and the 2026 NHL Draft to Chicago.

Should the 2023 first-round pick be in the top 10, the Lightning will instead transfer their own, unprotected first-round pick in the 2025 NHL Draft to the Blackhawks. In the event both of the Lightning's 2023 and 2024 picks are in the top 10, then Tampa Bay will transfer its unprotected first-round picks in the 2025 draft and the 2026 NHL Draft to Chicago.
Pick is the later selection of either New York Rangers' own 4th round pick in 2022 or the Winnipeg Jets' 4th round pick in 2022 NHL Draft (previously acquired by the New York Rangers).
The Coyotes will have their pick of the Leafs' 3rd pick in 2023 or 2nd round pick in 2025.
If Brown plays more than 30 regular season games in 2021-22, the conditional draft pick will be removed from the deal.
If either the Canadiens or Hurricanes first round pick are top 10 picks in the 2022 NHL Draft, Montreal will send the worst of the two picks.
Basically a salary dump as Seabrook is retiring

Philadelphia Flyers.name: No return - simply a salary dump
No return - simply a salary dump

New York Islanders.name: No return - simply a salary dump

2021-22.comment: Conditions on the 2022 2nd rounder going to Arizona in the Ladd deal: Coyotes get the better of the Islanders' two 2022 second round picks, either the Isles own or Colorado's (from the Devon Toews trade).

The conditional third-round pick becomes a second-round pick if Edmonton wins three rounds in the 2022 Stanley Cup playoffs and Keith is among the top four Edmonton defensemen in total ice time through those rounds.

2020-21.comment:
New Jersey gets a conditional 2021 4th round pick that becomes a 2022 3rd round pick if Edmonton wins a playoff round.

Oilers did not win a playoff round.

It’s a 3rd round pick in 2022 and a 4th round pick in 2023, with an added condition that if the Penguins make the Stanley Cup Final and Carter plays in 50%+ of the playoff games, that 3rd round pick graduates up to a 2nd rounder.

Penguins did not make the Stanley Cup final.

Three-team trade with San Jose. Maple Leafs acquired Nick Foligno from the Columbus Blue Jackets and Stefan Noesen from the San Jose Sharks. Columbus receives Toronto's 1st round pick in 2021 and Toronto's 4th round pick in 2022, while San Jose receives Toronto's 4th round pick in 2021.

Three-team trade with Columbus. Maple Leafs acquired Nick Foligno from the Columbus Blue Jackets and Stefan Noesen from the San Jose Sharks. Columbus receives Toronto's 1st round pick in 2021 and Toronto's 4th round pick in 2022, while San Jose receives Toronto's 4th round pick in 2021.

Three-team trade with Toronto. Maple Leafs acquired Nick Foligno from the Columbus Blue Jackets and Stefan Noesen from the San Jose Sharks. Columbus receives Toronto's 1st round pick in 2021 and Toronto's 4th round pick in 2022, while San Jose receives Toronto's 4th round pick in 2021.
Vegas receives the 2022 4th round pick if Stastny plays 5 games for Winnipeg in the 2020-21 season.
The condition on the pick is dependent on the number of games that Bjugstad plays the following season for the Wild.

2019-20.comment: The 2020 1st round pick shifts to a 2021 1st round pick if the Islanders' pick is in the top three this year. The 2022 3rd round pick will only transfer to the Senators if the Islanders win the Stanley Cup this year.
Carolina Hurricanes will have the option of deciding which of their own or the Toronto Maple Leafs' 1st round pick they give New York Rangers before the draft.
The conditional 4th rounder is conditioned on how many games Vatanen plays. If he hits a certain amount, then it becomes a 3rd round pick.
The 3rd round pick is the Flyers pick.
The 2nd round pick is the Penguins pick.
Pick is 4th in 2020, goes to a 3rd in 2021 if the Oilers get to final four and Green plays 50 percent of the games.
3rd pick becomes a 2nd rounder if the Penguins win the Stanley Cup.
5th round pick can turn into a 4th rounder if the Sabres make the playoffs and Simmonds plays 10 games.
The 6th round pick is the Sabres pick
Hannikainen must play in 10 games for the Coyotes in order for the Jackets to receive the conditional pick.
Chicago Blackhawks will receive the earlier of Calgary Flames two 3rd round picks in 2020.
The condition on the pick requires Persson to play in 25 NHL games during the 20-21 season.
The draft pick becomes a 3rd rounder if the Jets make playoffs or re-sign Eakin

The 2nd round pick originally belonged to the Colorado Avalanche, who dealt the selection to the Capitals last summer in the trade that brought Andre Burakovsky to Colorado. On the condition that the Caps win the Stanley Cup this season, the 3rd round pick in 2021 will become a 3rd round pick in 2020 (which originally belonged to Arizona).
If St-Louis re-signs Scandella prior to Oct. 7, 2020, or if they win two playoff rounds and he plays in at least half of the games in the first two rounds, Montreal gets a fourth in 2021.
2022 pick is conditional on Toffoli resigning with the Canucks

The 1st rounder being sent to New Jersey was acquired by the Lightning in the J.T. Miller trade with the Vancouver Canucks last summer. It carries a condition that if the Canucks miss the playoffs this season, the pick transfers to a 2021 first-round pick.

Minnesota will receive Pittsburgh's own 1st round pick in the 2020 draft if the Penguins make the Stanley Cup Playoffs. If Pittsburgh does not qualify for the postseason, it will have the option to instead give Minnesota its 1st round pick in 2021. The option will expire at 5 p.m. ET on June 1 2020.

The conditional third rounder in 2021 becomes a 2nd round pick if either Clifford re-signs with the Leafs OR Campbell wins a certain amount of games. Kings are guaranteed at least the 3rd Rd pick if neither of those conditions are met.

The 2020 first-round pick from Arizona in the Taylor Hall trade is top-three protected. Converts to 2021, if so.

The conditions on the 2021 pick are as follows: the third-round pick in 2021 becomes a second-round selection if Arizona wins a Stanley Cup Playoff round OR Taylor Hall re-signs in Arizona. The third-round pick in 2021 becomes a first-round selection if Arizona wins a Stanley Cup Playoff round AND Taylor Hall re-signs in Arizona. If neither condition happens, New Jersey still receives the 2021 third-round pick.

2018-19.comment: The draft pick will come from either San Jose or St. Louis (both owned by Buffalo) based on the final order of selection in the 2019 NHL Draft.
The 2nd will become a 1st if Dallas wins two rounds of the playoffs, and the 3rd also becomes a 1st if the Stars re-sign Zuccarello.
2020 pick conditional on Duchene resigning with Colombus, lottery protected if it’s a top 3 pick.

The 2019 2nd rounder is the better of San Jose's own or Florida's own, previously acquired. 
If the Sharks miss the playoffs in 2018-19, the 2019 or 2020 first-rounder will be in 2019; otherwise, itâ€™s a 2020 first-round pick that will go to Ottawa. 
If the Sharks re-sign Karlsson the Senators receive a conditional second-round pick in 2021 which would become a first-round pick if the Sharks make it to the Stanley Cup Final in 2019. 
If Karlsson is on an Eastern Conference roster (reserve list during the 2018-19 season, the Sharks would have to send the Senators an additional first-round pick no later than 2022.

2017-18.comment: Conditional 2nd round pick becomes a first-rounder if the Lightning win the Stanley Cup in either 2018 or 2019.
2019 pick is a second rounder if Kane doesn't resign with Sharks

If Winnipeg's pick is Nos. 1-3 in 2018, Blues will receive Jets' first-rounder in 2019. Otherwise, they get the 2018 1st round pick.

If Blues don't re-sign Foley before Aug. 16, 2019, then they receive Jets' 4th rounder in 2020.
The draft pick moves up to the fourth round if the Bruins reach the second round of the 2018 playoffs or Wingels re-signs in Boston this offseason.
Part of a three team trade with Las Vegas Knights where Las Vegas retains 40 per cent of Brassard's salary that season.
Part of a three team trade with Ottawa Senators involving Derick Brassard going to Pittsburgh where Las Vegas retains 40 per cent of Brassard's salary that season.

3-team trade between Senators, Avalanche and Predators. 

If Ottawaâ€™s 2018 1st round pick ends up being a top 10 pick, the Sens have the option to give Colorado their 2019 1st round pick instead.
3-team trade between Senators, Avalanche and Predators
The third round pick will become a second round pick if the Flames qualify for the Stanley Cup playoffs in 2017-18.

2016-17.comment: Coyotes get conditional pick if Stone re-signs with Flames.
Pick becomes a 2018 2nd rounder if Yakupov scores 15 goals in 2016-17
Panthers acquired rights to Yandle. Rangers receive 2017 pick if Yandle signs with Florida.

2015-16.comment: The third-round pick becomes a second-rounder if the Ducks win two playoff rounds. If it's a third-round pick, it will be in 2016. If it is escalated to a second-round pick, that selection will be made in 2017. The pick will not be escalted unless McGinn plays in more than 50 per cent of the Ducks' playoff games.
2018 pick is conditional on Blackhawks winning Stanley Cup in 2016

Philadelphia Flyers.name: 2016 conditional 4th round pick or 2017 3rd round pick

Pittsburgh Penguins.name: 2016 conditional 5th round pick (if Samuelsson plays 40 or more games with Coyotes in 2014-15 season)

Florida Panthers.name: Conditional draft pick - 2016 fourth round or 2017 sixth round depending on how many games Robak plays for Panthers in 2014-15

2013-14.comment: Should the Rangers advance to the 2014 Eastern Conference Final, the 2014 second-rounder would become a first-round pick. In the event Callahan should re-sign with the Lightning, the Rangers would receive Tampa Bay`s second-round pick at the 2015 NHL Draft while the Lightning would receive the Rangers` seventh-round draft pick in 2015.

2011-12.comment: The conditional 2013 5th round pick is actually the returned pick acquired by Nashville in the Hal Gill trade.
Red Wings receive pick if Lightning make 2012 playoffs and Commodore plays 15 regular season games.
Columbus get the Kings 2013 pick if  Kings do not make playoffs in 2011-12 season. If Kings make playoffs, Columbus has choice of 2012 or 2013 pick.

1970-71.comment:
This trade changed the history of hockey. 

Imagine if Lafleur wasn't part of the great 70s Canadiens teams, they would still have had an excellent roster, but would they have won as much?
